text: Anton Eduardovich Polyakov (11 November 1987 - 8 October 2021) was a Ukrainian politician and businessman. He was born in Chernihiv, Ukraine. Polyakov was a member of the Servant of the People Party. Between 2019 until his death, he was a member of the Verkhovna Rada. Polyakov died on 8 October 2021 of cardiac arrest while riding a taxi in Kyiv, Ukraine at the age of 33.У Києві знайшли мертвим народного депутата Антона Полякова ==References== Category:1987 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada Category:Ukrainian businesspeople Category:Disease-related deaths in Ukraine Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:People from Chernihiv Oblast
title: Anton Polyakov
